articles.title: China-wary India sends defence attaches to African, Asian nations in a first - India Today
articles.description: India will post defence attaches in several African countries including Ethiopia Ivory CoastMozambique and strategically important Djibouti
articles.content: In a first, India will post defence attaches in several countries, with a focus on Africa, aimed at strengthening strategic ties and military diplomacy amid China's increasing efforts to expand its i… [+3731 chars]
